MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH41 postcode area of Birkenhead, affecting properties in Wood Street, Russell Street and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2:16PM. Our emergency response team is currently on site carrying out investigations and will commence repairs to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. Once we receive information from them we will make every effort to let you know when the power will be restored. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:30PM on 19th April 2021.
